amendatorysection.catchline: Certificate of registration; required; violation; injunction.
amendatorysection.para: No person shall practice as a professional landscape architect or in any manner designate himself a landscape architect unless he has been issued a certificate of registration pursuant to sections 81-8,184 to 81-8,208. If such person does practice or attempt to practice under the designation landscape architect, he may be restrained under permanent injunction.
